query: CREATE (developer:Role {name: 'Developer', description: 'Responsible for writing, reviewing, and maintaining code for software applications.'}),
(uiDeveloper:Role {name: 'UI Developer', description: 'Focuses on designing and implementing user interfaces for web and mobile applications.'}),
(qaEngineer:Role {name: 'QA Engineer', description: 'Ensures the quality of software by testing functionality, performance, and security.'}),
(backendEngineer:Role {name: 'Backend Engineer', description: 'Develops server-side logic, APIs, and database interactions to support applications.'}),
(dataScientist:Role {name: 'Data Scientist', description: 'Analyzes data, builds predictive models, and provides insights to improve business decisions.'}),
(mlEngineer:Role {name: 'ML Engineer', description: 'Develops and deploys machine learning models and optimizes AI-driven applications.'}),
(cloudArchitect:Role {name: 'Cloud Architect', description: 'Designs and manages cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalability and security.'}),
(securityAnalyst:Role {name: 'Security Analyst', description: 'Monitors security threats, conducts audits, and implements cybersecurity policies.'}),
(dbAdmin:Role {name: 'Database Administrator', description: 'Manages databases, optimizes queries, and ensures data integrity and security.'}),
(productManager:Role {name: 'Product Manager', description: 'Defines product vision, roadmap, and strategy while working closely with stakeholders.'}),
(accessCodebase:Entitlement {name: 'Access Codebase', description: 'Allows developers to access and modify the project’s source code.'}),
(mergedPRs:Entitlement {name: 'Merged PRs', description: 'Grants permission to review and merge pull requests into the main branch.'}),
(deployToStaging:Entitlement {name: 'Deploy to Staging', description: 'Allows deployment of code to the staging environment for testing.'}),
(modifyUIComponents:Entitlement {name: 'Modify UI Components', description: 'Allows UI developers to update and create front-end components.'}),
(accessDesignSystem:Entitlement {name: 'Access Design System', description: 'Provides access to the organization’s design system and style guidelines.'}),
(submitUIBugReports:Entitlement {name: 'Submit UI Bug Reports', description: 'Grants permission to log and track UI-related issues in the system.'}),
(executeTestCases:Entitlement {name: 'Execute Test Cases', description: 'Allows execution of automated and manual test cases.'}),
(logDefects:Entitlement {name: 'Log Defects', description: 'Enables the logging and tracking of software defects.'}),
(accessTestReports:Entitlement {name: 'Access Test Reports', description: 'Provides access to detailed reports on test execution and results.'}),
(modifyAPIEndpoints:Entitlement {name: 'Modify API Endpoints', description: 'Grants permission to update and create API endpoints.'}),
(accessDatabase:Entitlement {name: 'Access Database', description: 'Allows direct read and write access to the project’s database.'}),
(optimizePerformance:Entitlement {name: 'Optimize Performance', description: 'Enables engineers to analyze and improve backend performance.'}),
(accessDatasets:Entitlement {name: 'Access Datasets', description: 'Provides access to raw and processed datasets for analysis.'}),
(runExperiments:Entitlement {name: 'Run Experiments', description: 'Allows running of experiments and A/B testing on data models.'}),
(deployModels:Entitlement {name: 'Deploy Models', description: 'Grants permission to deploy machine learning models into production.'}),
(trainModels:Entitlement {name: 'Train Models', description: 'Allows engineers to train machine learning models using datasets.'}),
(deployMLPipelines:Entitlement {name: 'Deploy ML Pipelines', description: 'Grants permission to deploy automated ML workflows.'}),
(monitorModelPerformance:Entitlement {name: 'Monitor Model Performance', description: 'Enables monitoring of deployed models for performance and drift.'}),
(manageCloudInfrastructure:Entitlement {name: 'Manage Cloud Infrastructure', description: 'Grants access to manage cloud-based servers and services.'}),
(optimizeCloudCosts:Entitlement {name: 'Optimize Cloud Costs', description: 'Allows for cost analysis and optimization of cloud resources.'}),
(setSecurityPolicies:Entitlement {name: 'Set Security Policies', description: 'Enables the creation and enforcement of cloud security policies.'}),
(conductSecurityAudits:Entitlement {name: 'Conduct Security Audits', description: 'Allows execution of security assessments and penetration tests.'}),
(monitorThreats:Entitlement {name: 'Monitor Threats', description: 'Provides access to threat intelligence and security logs.'}),
(implementSecurityControls:Entitlement {name: 'Implement Security Controls', description: 'Grants permission to apply security patches and configurations.'}),
(manageDatabaseSchema:Entitlement {name: 'Manage Database Schema', description: 'Allows modifications to database structure and schema.'}),
(optimizeQueries:Entitlement {name: 'Optimize Queries', description: 'Grants access to improve and optimize SQL queries.'}),
(backupRestoreData:Entitlement {name: 'Backup & Restore Data', description: 'Provides permission to perform database backups and restores.'}),
(defineProductRoadmap:Entitlement {name: 'Define Product Roadmap', description: 'Grants access to set and update the product roadmap.'}),
(prioritizeFeatures:Entitlement {name: 'Prioritize Features', description: 'Allows prioritization of new features based on business needs.'}),
(gatherCustomerFeedback:Entitlement {name: 'Gather Customer Feedback', description: 'Provides access to customer insights and feedback collection.'}),
(alice:User {name: 'Alice', description: 'Senior Developer'}),
(bob:User {name: 'Bob', description: 'QA Lead'}),
(charlie:User {name: 'Charlie', description: 'Cloud Admin'}),
(david:User {name: 'David', description: 'Product Manager'}),
(eve:User {name: 'Eve', description: 'Security Specialist'}),
(alice)-[:OWNS_ROLE]->(developer),
(alice)-[:OWNS_ROLE]->(backendEngineer),
(bob)-[:OWNS_ROLE]->(qaEngineer),
(charlie)-[:OWNS_ROLE]->(cloudArchitect),
(david)-[:OWNS_ROLE]->(productManager),
(eve)-[:OWNS_ROLE]->(securityAnalyst),
(alice)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(accessCodebase),
(alice)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(mergedPRs),
(bob)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(executeTestCases),
(bob)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(logDefects),
(charlie)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(manageCloudInfrastructure),
(charlie)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(optimizeCloudCosts),
(eve)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(conductSecurityAudits),
(eve)-[:CAN_GRANT]->(monitorThreats)
